meanings.sent1: The teasellers set up their stall in the market.
meanings.sent2: I bought some tea from the friendly teasellers at the corner.
meanings.sent3: The teasellers had a tea party to celebrate their successful day.
meanings.sent4: The teasellers' smiles were as warm as a cup of freshly brewed tea.
meanings.sent5: The teasellers' colorful umbrellas made them easy to spot in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: Teasellers require good knowledge of different tea varieties.
meanings.sent2: The teasellers' business thrived during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The teasellers' competition turned into a tea-selling contest.
meanings.sent4: The teasellers' enthusiasm for tea was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The teasellers' dedication to quality tea was evident in every cup they served.
